General.Name: Accel Solutions Group Ltd
General.Description: Accel Solutions Group Ltd engages in real estate development business in Ethiopia, Israel, and New York, the United States. The company also promotes and enhances technological projects in the areas of life sciences and cleantech; and engages in sorting and marketing of edible chicken eggs. It provides its products through retail chains and distributors. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Ramat Gan, Israel. Accel Solutions Group Ltd is a subsidiary of Ultra Equity Investments Ltd.
